citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30am on 24-MAR-
2021.
The APHIS Inspector spoke with a facility representative who was leaving the premises for an appointment and she
stated there was no one else available to facilitate an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30am on 24-MAR-
2021. 
The APHIS Inspector spoke with a facility representative  who was leaving the premises for an appointment and she 
stated there was no one else available  to facilitate an inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
